proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

stake(address,uint256,string).details: Staker must provide prior approval to this contract for transfering ERC20 asset

params.asset: address of the ERC20 token to stake

stakeClisBNB(string).details: Receives $BNB from msg.sender and delegate $clisBNB to the Vault$clisBNB is a non-transferable tokenUser's staked balance can be read using stakerGateway's balanceOf()

stakeNative(string).details: Internally converts $BNB into $WBNB and deposits them to the Vaultverify WNATIVE has same transferFrom() implementation as WBNB before deploying on other chains

params.asset: address of the ERC20 token to unstake

unstakeClisBNB(uint256,string).details: Internally converts $clisBNB back to $BNB and sends them to user

unstakeNative(uint256,string).details: Internally converts $WBNB back to $BNB and sends them to user

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

balanceOf(address,address).notice: Returns the balance of an asset for a given owner

getConfig().notice: Returns the address of the Config instance

getVault(address).notice: Returns the address of the Vault for an asset

stake(address,uint256,string).notice: Stakes an ERC20 asset in the protocol

stakeClisBNB(string).notice: Stakes native tokens in the protocol for clisBNB

stakeNative(string).notice: Stakes native tokens in the protocol

unstake(address,uint256,string).notice: Unstakes an ERC20 asset in the protocol

unstakeNative(uint256,string).notice: Unstakes native tokens from the protocol
